content: learn how to turn flat circles into granny squares in this simple tutorial > this pattern is available free on my blog click here for the free version 1 i have used stylecraft special aran in colours baby mint baby pink saffron aspen white and fondant to make my squares with a 5mm h hook but you can use any yarn you like just use the hook size recommended on your yarn materials yarn darning needle stitch marker optional hook use the hook size recommended on your yarn ball band 1 https //lullabylodge blogspot com/2019/05/how-to-turn-your-circles-into-granny html
